name: Jackfruit Tacos
description: These jackfruit tacos are the ultimate comfort food! The tacos are so delicious, completely vegan, and ready in only 30 minutes!
recipeIngredient: 2 20 oz cans young green jackfruit in brine or water
red cabbage, cut into thin strips
1 cup unsweetend coconut or soy yogurt

recipeInstructions.text: Drain and rinse the jackfruit. Remove the core and shred it with a fork.
recipeInstructions.name: Drain and rinse the jackfruit. Remove the core and shred it with a fork.

recipeInstructions.text: In a large pan, heat some oil. Cook for about 3 minutes or until translucent. Add the garlic and cook for 1 more minute.
recipeInstructions.name: In a large pan, heat some oil. Cook for about 3 minutes or until translucent. Add the garlic and cook for 1 more minute.

recipeInstructions.text: Add the jackfruit and cook for 1 minute on medium heat. Add the BBQ sauce, the smoked paprika powder, the cumin, the maple syrup, and the juice of half a lime.
recipeInstructions.name: Add the jackfruit and cook for 1 minute on medium heat. Add the BBQ sauce, the smoked paprika powder, the cumin, the maple syrup, and the juice of half a lime.

recipeInstructions.text: Stir well. Cook for 10 minutes on medium heat. Stir every few minutes.
recipeInstructions.name: Stir well. Cook for 10 minutes on medium heat. Stir every few minutes.

recipeInstructions.text: In the meantime, make the yogurt sauce. Combine the plant-based yogurt with the minced garlic and season with salt and pepper.
recipeInstructions.name: In the meantime, make the yogurt sauce. Combine the plant-based yogurt with the minced garlic and season with salt and pepper.

recipeInstructions.text: Warm the tortillas or taco shells according to the package directions
recipeInstructions.name: Warm the tortillas or taco shells according to the package directions

recipeInstructions.text: Fill the tortillas with lettuce, red cabbage, pulled jackfruit, corn, and avocado.
recipeInstructions.name: Fill the tortillas with lettuce, red cabbage, pulled jackfruit, corn, and avocado.

recipeInstructions.text: Add the garlic sauce, a squeeze of lime juice, and the chopped cilantro on top. If you want you could also add some chilis. Enjoy!
recipeInstructions.name: Add the garlic sauce, a squeeze of lime juice, and the chopped cilantro on top. If you want you could also add some chilis. Enjoy!
